Text:
Hi 20-40,

Jon

@zmacdaddy8: I am big fan of Ms. Fey, of SNL crew in any appearance or shape and... I downloaded in past three days ALL versions of Telesync for "Date Night" - and they are all (let speak openly) - a garbage. I wasted over 2.8 GB for download, and when something decent comes out, I would re-encode it. But, judging from all three TS (even if one lies about the source) which use ELEKTRIKA's "pumping-flicker" crap and boldly was watermarked by morons who have encoded that. They have over-boosted colors so much, "flickering" is un-removable and I will wait probably R5 or even DVDrip - for sake of my own sanity...

@zmacdaddy8: BTW, "Skjul" was the first [quark] upped. It is Norwegian horror and has been 95.4 MB "big" (torrent is probably dead by now).

@Jon: Thanks.
Dude!!!! You are the greatest of all time .....Will definitely seed once done...
